Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the  Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to a collision with a vehicle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the  Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to a collision with a vehicle.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
